9iPJ[/Nx%=,n+vdj%5XO.text:
Welcome to the "control panel" of this engine.

Turns and SOUL colors are controlled here.

The script all the way to the left is the turns. Do whatever you want to it.

HOWEVER,
There is a basic turn structure:
===========================
broadcast [turn start]
change [turn #] by 1
broadcast {soul color} ((if needed))
wait {time}
broadcast [turn over]
wait [1] secs
wait until <(okay, go) = 2>
set [okay, go] to [0]
===========================
Rinse and repeat.
Have fun.
